title: Blinken Details New Steps in ‘Havana Syndrome’ Response
sub_head: Biden administration steps up efforts to get at causes, effects of mysterious neurological illnesses
body:
Secretary of State Antony Blinken on Friday announced additional steps in the State Department’s response to mysterious health incidents among U.S. diplomats and relatives, including new leadership, increased access to treatment and efforts to understand and prevent the incidents.
Termed “Havana Syndrome” for the location in which it was first reported in 2016, the anomalous neurological condition has affected U.S. diplomats and their family members around the world. The Central Intelligence Agency, which has reported its own cases of the ailment, tapped an unidentified veteran of the hunt for Osama bin Laden to lead its task force on AHIs.
